page.title: 10CLUBS
page.content: {Sheepy Magna Womens Institute}hold their meetings every third Wednesday of the month at the village Memorial Hall. They have about 28 members. Their activities includ a monthly speaker, social and fund raising evnts and local projects.Sheepy W.I. was formed in 1936.{Sibson W.I.}meets every first Wednesday of the month at Sibson Village Hall and has about 20 members.It was formed in 1973. {Sheepy Magna's Darby and Joan }for men and women over 60 years of age has a membership of about 20 and they meet on the fourth Tuesday of the month at Sheepy Memorial Hall. {The Brownies,}for girls aged 8 to 11 years, meet on Wednesday evenings in Sheepy Magna Primary School.
